description: A pair of blasts at the Boston Marathon on Monday left three people dead, including a child, and at least 140 more injured.
title: Carnage at the Marathon
title_page: Carnage at the Marathon - The New York Times
maintext:
Slide 1 of 15,
Two bombs exploded near the finish line at the Boston Marathon on Monday, leaving at least three people dead and dozens more wounded.
Police officers ran onto the course moments after the first explosion.
